title: ЛАПТОП ASUS TUF GAMING A15 FA507NV-LP020 R7-7735HS/16GB DDR5/1TB/RTX 4060 8GB

features.Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 7735HS Mobile Processor (8-core/16-thread, 16MB L3 cache, up to 4.7 GHz max boost)
features.Audio: 2-speaker system, AI noise-canceling technology, Dolby Atmos, Hi-Res certification
features.USB Ports: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C support DisplayPort / power delivery / G-SYNC, 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A
features.USB-C Port: 1x Type C USB 4 support DisplayPort, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C support DisplayPort / power delivery / G-SYNC
